features.name: Authentication
features.description: User login with NextAuth using credentials provider with hardcoded admin and database fallback

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Main dashboard with statistics, monthly stats, and TAT alerts

features.name: Client Management
features.description: CRUD operations for clients with pricing, VAT, and currency settings

features.name: Sample Management
features.description: Manage samples with batch operations and client associations

features.name: Workflow Management
features.description: Hierarchical workflow categories including Extraction & QC, Open Array, HID, NGS, MicroArray, Blood Profiling with nested subcategories and filtering

features.name: Instrument Management
features.description: Track instruments with maintenance logs and service reminders

features.name: Stock Management
features.description: Inventory tracking with stock batches and supplier associations

features.name: Reports
features.description: Upload and manage laboratory reports with file storage

features.name: QC Reports
features.description: Quality control reports with PASSED/FAILED status tracking and statistics dashboard

features.name: Navigation
features.description: Main layout with sidebar navigation including expandable workflow categories

features.name: UI Components
features.description: Reusable UI components built with Radix UI
